content: The amount of fruit and flowers... the stirring technique, mm-hmm! I didn't know a tea recipe could require such precision.
info: 围炉煮茶-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: It must be down to Captain Mo's special recipe! I have to write it down... write... it... down... huh?! No! I can't fall asleep! I've got to prepare for the store's grand opening!
info: 围炉煮茶-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: Isn't tea supposed to perk you up? {A打哈欠}How bizarre... After drinking Captain Mo's tea, I'm starting to feel a little... drowsy... huh?!
info: 围炉煮茶-格连闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A歪头}If we don't follow the recipe carefully, we might end up...{短暂停} <style=SizeSmall>meeting our great-great-grandmas!</style>

content: Just like Captain Mo said, overcoming setbacks is a crucial part of growth! {A豆豆眼}Hm? So... how many times have I grown from them? <style=SizeSmall>Uh... well... that's...</style>

content: While applying to open the shop, I learned a lot of new things about certificates, business licenses, and fire safety...
